short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Talk to websites to write or chat. Click where you want to type, then press the microphone button in the bottom right corner.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
**Why Talking is Better Than Typing**

It's just faster: Think about it – we speak way faster than we type. This extension makes filling out forms and searching online super quick.

Multitask like a pro: You can talk to your browser while doing something else. No need to stop what you're doing just to type.

Say goodbye to sore fingers: Typing a lot can be tiring, right? Speaking instead of typing means you can avoid that strain.

Everyone can use it: For anyone who finds typing tough or just slow, speaking to your browser makes everything more accessible.

Save time: Who doesn't want to get things done faster? Speaking your searches or form entries can save you a bunch of time.

Less typos: Let's be honest, we all make typing mistakes. Speaking to your browser can actually help cut down on those.

Easy to use: No complicated setup here. Just click and start talking – it's that simple.

Your privacy matters: This extension takes your privacy seriously. Your voice stays yours and isn't stored anywhere. We only use the audio for transcription and will never sell it to third parties. 

So, why not switch to talking instead of typing? It's about making everything you do online easier and faster. Give it a try and see how it changes your online game.
